uthuru nangenahira janathawata polis niladharingen ho ema departhamenthuwen yam agathiyak siduwuwahoth paminili idiripath kirima sandaha ema pradeshawala karyala pihituwimata polis komisama magin piyawara gena atha.polis komisama balathmaka karamin mema masa aarambha wimath samangama ema thiranaya gathbawa ehi samajika prawina madhyawedi niwtan gunarathna mahatha pawasayi.mita wasara thunakata pera pathwa thibu polis komisan sabhawata uthuru nangenahira janathawata dugganawili idiripath kirimata awasthawa nothibini.manushika mehewara magin ema janathawage siwil ayithin thahawuru kara rajaya uthuru nagenahira pradeshawala siwil nithiya kriyathmaka kirima sandaha polis sthana pihituwimen pasu palamuwarata siwil wasiyanta paminili idiripath kirime awasthawa udakaradimata polis komisama magin mese piyawara gena atha.biyakin ho sakayakin thorawa thamata polisiyen siduwana akatayuthukam pilibanda paminili kirimata idiripathwana lesa uthuru nagenahira janathawagen gunarathna mahatha illimak da kaleya.rate siyalu pradesha aawaranaya wana paridi palath nawaya pura polis komisame karyala pihituwana bawada jathi bhedayekin thorawa oonama ayekuta shri lankikayaku lesa polis komisamata paminili idiripath kala haki bawada penwa dena ee mahatha ema paminili itha swadhina ayurin wibhaga karana bawa dinamina kala wimasumakadi sandahan kaleya..

idiriye rajapakshawarunge ana paridi kuliyata mini maru saha eewata aadhara anubala dun pirisda soya parikshana kriyathmaka wimata niyamitha bawata warthawe.me siyalla wasan kara ganimata mahinda rajapaksha wisin agamathiwaraya sambandha kara ganna lesa thama niladharinta upades di atha.agamathiwarayawa durakathanaya osse sambandha kara ganimata nohaki bawa niladharin wisin mahinda rajapakshata danum di atha.pasuwa mahinda rajapaksha wisinma durakathana amathumak laba gena athi athara dadi weri mathin agamathiwarayage niladharinta ohu bana wadi atha.kese wethath agamathiwarayawa sambandha kirimata nohaki bawa pawasa owun durakathanaya wisandhi kara atha.

namuth samanthapasadikawa thula prapanchasudhani nam granthaya pilibandawath sumangala wilasiniya pilibandawath thorathuru sandahanwa atha.
